Title / Source: BAE-ViT: An Efficient Multimodal Vision Transformer for Bone Age Estimation

Title / Source: Self-accumulative Vision Transformer for Bone Age Assessment Using Sauvegrain Method

Title / Source: A Deep Learning Approach to Pediatric Bone Age Assessment

Title / Source: Bone age estimation with HS-optimized ResNet and YOLO for region detection
Key Points: Novel DL combining harmony search optimization with ResNet + YOLO for ROI detection; addresses child growth disorders accurately

Title / Source: A ROI Extraction Method for Wrist Imaging Applied in Smart Bone-Age Assessment

Title / Source: Impact of Ensemble Learning in the Assessment of Skeletal Maturity

Title / Source: Pediatric Bone Age Assessment using Deep Learning with Pre-trained Models

Title / Source: Coarse-to-fine segmentation and ensemble convolutional neural networks
